keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By MITCH SMITH and MATT FURBER

lead_paragraph: Law enforcement officials were still investigating Dahir Adan’s motive in the attack at a St. Cloud mall, even as much remained unknown about him.

headline.print_headline: Minnesota Knife Attacker Had Only Infrequent, Minor Brushes With the Police
headline.main: Minnesota Knife Attacker Had Only Infrequent, Minor Brushes With Police

snippet: Law enforcement officials were still investigating Dahir Adan’s motive in the attack at a St. Cloud mall, even as much remained unknown about him....
abstract: Profile of Dahir Adan, Somali immigrant who was killed by off-duty police officer in St Cloud, Minn, following stabbing rampage at shopping mall that injured 10 people; St Cloud Police Chief William Blair Anderson says there is no evidence to date of Adan's involvement with any terrorist groups, despite fact that Islamic State has claimed responsibility for attack.
